price: 37. Kaadu tet addal ken finqa tascassee asta cabne, qansaru Íe digaalak meesita marah. (moominiin kinnuk).
arabic: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wataraknā fīhā āyatan lilladhīna yakhāfūna al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
